TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract TimeZone implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._TimeZone

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft Windows 所支持的时区的信息。

span.span: Represents information for a time zone as supported by Microsoft Windows.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 时区 是 Outlook 时区数据包装。

span.span: The TimeZone object is an Outlook wrapper for time zone data.

para.span: 可从 Windows 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 区域获取此类数据。

span.span: This data can be obtained from the Windows registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones.

para.span: 在这种情况下，此对象的某些属性是在注册表中的时区的 TZI 值中的部分。

span.span: In this case, some properties of this object are parts of in the TZI value for the time zone in the registry.

para.span: TZI 值映射到 Windows TIME_ZONE_INFORMATION

span.span: A TZI value is mapped to the Windows TIME_ZONE_INFORMATION
